contact_info_p1: If you have an offer or a job for me, then you can use the suggested communication methods below. I will try to respond to your message or letter within two to three days, of course, if it is not a weekend.
contact_info_p2: Please, note that **I really prefer Telegram or Discord for any further discussions**.
index_paragraph_1:
"I am a developer and I write code because I like it." - moretsu (hey, he did this site) 

I am developing an unknown site BotiCord in order to help the Discord community to find little-known but promising bots.
